channel.title: travel on Frédéric Silvestre's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in travel on Frédéric Silvestre's Blog

item.title: Meeting the giants
item.description: In early July 2021, in the middle of the coronavirus pandemic, we could eventually visit Sequoia National Park and Kings Canyon National Park to observe the oldest living organis on Earth.

item.title: Air travel with a baby toddler
item.description: By the age of 2, Elina had around 30 flights in her experience. That also means, that we, as parents, gathered some experience how it is to travel with a baby.
